        Description copied from interface: AsyncConnectorInfoManager
        Add a promise which will be fulfilled with the ConnectorInfo for the given . Add a Promise which will be fulfilled immediately if the ConnectorInfo is maintained currently by this instance or later when it became available.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        new promise

      • findConnectorInfoAsync

        public org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<ConnectorInfo,RuntimeException> findConnectorInfoAsync(ConnectorKeyRange keyRange)
        Description copied from interface: AsyncConnectorInfoManager
        Add a promise which will be fulfilled with the ConnectorInfo for the given . Add a Promise which will be fulfilled immediately if the ConnectorInfo is maintained currently by this instance or later when it became available. There may be multiple ConnectorInfo matching the range. The implementation can only randomly fulfill the promise. It can not grantee the highest version to return because it may became available after the promised added and after a lower version of ConnectorInfo became available in this manager.
        Specified by:
        findConnectorInfoAsync in interface AsyncConnectorInfoManager
        Returns:
        new promise
